title: Infant and Childhood Vaccines: List and Schedule by Age
description: What vaccines does baby need? Are vaccines safe? Here's everything you need to know about immunization.
cleaned_text: Childhood Immunizations Childhood Vaccine Basics Vaccine Safety Types of Childhood Vaccines educational health content on What To Expect is [reviewed by our medical review board and team of experts](//www.whattoexpect.com/medical-review/) to be up-to-date and in line with the latest evidence-based medical information and accepted health guidelines, including the medically reviewed What to Expect books by Heidi Murkoff. This educational content is not medical or diagnostic advice.
